content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your plumbing needs today?
I want to speak to your manager right now! This is ridiculous!
I understand your frustration and want to help resolve this quickly. May I know what issue you're experiencing so I can assist you properly?
No, just get me the manager! This is wasting my time.
I'm here to assist you, and if needed, I can escalate this to a human operator for further help. Would you like me to do that now?
